item.title: Service Interphone System Nose Gear Jack – Flight Interphone Jack Operative

remarks.para: Service interphone flight deck to ground/ground to flight deck function may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Alternate procedures are established and used, and
Nose gear/ forward fuselage flight interphone jack is operative.
Use flight interphone for communication with ground crew during ground handling operations.

placard.para: Placard Crewmember Interphone System Flight Deck to Ground "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
